title: Introducing: Giants
body:
Picking up the now frighteningly successful Oh Wonder strategy of releasing one song a month, UK duo **Giants** (Ben Burrows & Rich Cooper) take it one step further by adding a unique twist of their own – calling in a guest vocalists for each track.

Think of it like an indie Disclosure meets Oh Wonder, in terms of strategy. Last months offering, _Forfeit_, featuring London’s **YADi** had elements of Two Door Cinema Club and Foals to it, whereas Aprils effort, _Sparks Fly_, calls in the vocal talents of **We Are Scientists’** devilishly handsome frontman Keith Murray, and is another potential future indie favourite. Certainly a fascinating concept, and one that would no doubt make for a raucous live show as front(wo)men swap in and out, it’ll be interesting to see where Giants go from here (please bring in Adam Lazzara for a track). Check out both tracks below.
